content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: Hello Aziz, it's great to meet you. Based on the information you've provided, what rental price are you looking for?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content: I am looking to rent the apartment for 800 Euros per month. Thank you for considering my offer.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for considering my offer! Based on the size and location of the apartment, I'm afraid I can't accept an offer of 800 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiation and would be willing to discuss a lower rental price that is still fair for both parties. What are some other factors that you would be willing to consider in order to reach an agreement?
name: Aziz Trabelsi

content:
I understand, I was just trying to see if you are open to negotiation. I would be willing to negotiate on the rental price if you are. Thank you.

And what would be a fair rental price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your understanding. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I believe a fair rental price would be around 1000 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing a lower rental price if you have any concerns or if there are any additional factors at play.
name: Aziz Trabelsi
